game.add: Add the game to the wishlist
game.paragraph1: The Wild West dueling card roguelite. Duelite is an attractive card game where you must survive countless duels against all types of rivals in the Wild West. Will you be able to build a deck on par with the most wanted? Find out yourself!
game.paragraph2: Duelite is a card roguelite set in the Wild West where each game is different. Starring Jhonny Coust and his friends, very imaginative children who see in everything they encounter, fierce enemies to defeat with their collections of cards.
game.paragraph3: In each game, you will have the opportunity to duel terrible rivals, and as you advance and overcome each duel, you will be able to choose new cards to add to your deck. Every time you defeat a boss, you can stop by the store, where you can buy passive items to help you in your search for the most wanted in the Wild West. Will you be able to capture all the bandits?
